text.name: ads_maintenancePrice_tooltip
text.text: Adjusts the cost of all workshop services, including inspections, repairs, and overhauls. A higher value makes all maintenance activities more expensive.

text.name: ads_maintenanceDuration_tooltip
text.text: Adjusts the duration of all workshop services. A higher value increases the time your vehicle will spend undergoing maintenance or repairs.

text.name: ads_workshopOpenHour_tooltip
text.text: The hour of the day when the workshop opens. Repairs are only active during work hours.

text.name: ads_workshopCloseHour_tooltip
text.text: The hour of the day when the workshop closes. Repairs will pause after this time.

text.name: ads_engineMaxHeat_tooltip
text.text: The base rate of heat generated by the engine at maximum load. Higher values will cause the engine to heat up faster.

text.name: ads_dirtInfluence_tooltip
text.text: The maximum reduction in radiator efficiency due to dirt. 20% means a fully dirty vehicle's cooling is 20% less effective.

text.name: ads_instantInspection_tooltip
text.text: Enables instant vehicle inspection without waiting time.

text.name: ads_parkVehicle_tooltip
text.text: If enabled, vehicles undergoing maintenance are skipped when cycling with TAB.

text.name: ads_aiOverloadAndOverheatControl_tooltip
text.text: If enabled, the AI worker reduces load to prevent engine overload or overheating.

text.name: ads_debugMode_tooltip
text.text: Enables or disables debug panel and extensive debug logging in the console.

text.name: ads_serviceInterval_tooltip
text.text: Sets the base service interval after which maintenance is required. The actual interval will vary depending on the vehicle brand, age, and quality of previous maintenance.

text.name: ads_vehicleLifespan_tooltip
text.text: Sets the base lifespan of the vehicle, after which its condition will reach 0%. The closer the condition is to zero, the more unreliable the vehicle becomes.

text.name: ads_breakdownFrequency_tooltip
text.text: Controls how often random breakdowns occur. At 100%, a fully operational vehicle will experience a breakdown roughly every 20 hours. As condition deteriorates, the frequency increases significantly — down to once per hour at critical condition.

text.name: ads_thermalSensitivity_tooltip
text.text: Adjusts the thermal model behavior. Higher settings make the engine and transmission more sensitive to load, ambient temperature, and radiator fouling — generating more heat under the same conditions.

text.name: ads_ws_info_no_breakdowns
text.text: There are no breakdowns or they have not yet been detected.

text.name: ads_ws_info_nothing_to_repair_text
text.text: Please select one or more items to repair from the list.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_general_wear_stage1_description
text.text: The accumulated stress of years of hard work. Minor, irreversible wear on core components slightly reduces overall performance.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_overheat_protection_stage1_message
text.text: Engine limp mode active! Power reduced!

text.name: ads_breakdowns_overheat_protection_stage2_message
text.text: Engine limp mode active! Power reduced!

text.name: ads_breakdowns_overheat_protection_stage3_message
text.text: Engine limp mode active! Power reduced!

text.name: ads_breakdowns_overheat_protection_stage4_message
text.text: Engine is turned off to protect from overheating

text.name: ads_breakdowns_ecu_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: ECU errors. Slightly reduced engine power.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_ecu_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: ECU malfunction. Noticeable power loss and increased fuel consumption.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_ecu_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Critical ECU malfunction. Significant power loss, high fuel consumption, and risk of engine stalls.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_ecu_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Complete ECU failure. The engine cannot be controlled and will not start.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_turbocharger_wear_stage1_description
text.text: Worn turbo bearings. A faint whistling sound can be heard, and there's a slight loss of power at high RPM.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_turbocharger_wear_stage2_description
text.text: Leaking turbo seals. Noticeable power loss, increased fuel consumption.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_turbocharger_wear_stage3_description
text.text: Damaged turbine blades. Severe power loss and a risk of engine stalls under heavy load.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_turbocharger_wear_stage4_description
text.text: Catastrophic turbo failure. The engine has lost most of its power and is in danger of severe internal damage.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_pump_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Early fuel pump wear. Slightly reduced engine power and increased fuel consumption.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_pump_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Fuel pressure dropping. Noticeable power loss, higher fuel consumption, and occasional engine stalls.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_pump_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Critical fuel pressure. Severe power loss, very high fuel consumption, and frequent engine stalls.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_pump_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Complete fuel pump failure. Fuel is not supplied to the engine.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_injector_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: One or more injectors have slightly clogged nozzles. The engine may run a bit rough, with a minor loss of power.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_injector_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Poor fuel atomization. The engine misfires under load, resulting in noticeable power loss and engine hesitation.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_injector_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: A fuel injector is sticking. The engine runs very poorly, with significant power loss and unreliable starting.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_fuel_injector_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: An injector has completely failed. The engine will not run correctly and may not start at all.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_brake_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Worn brake pads. A slight decrease in braking effectiveness.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_brake_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Leaking brake fluid or worn discs. Braking distance is noticeably increased.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_brake_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Severe loss of brake pressure. Brakes are very weak and unreliable.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_brake_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Complete brake system failure. Further operation is extremely dangerous.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_slip_stage1_description
text.text: Worn clutch plates. Occasional power loss due to transmission slipping under load.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_slip_stage2_description
text.text: Significant clutch wear. Noticeable transmission slipping, especially during acceleration.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_slip_stage3_description
text.text: Heavily worn clutch. Severe slipping makes it difficult to transfer power to the wheels.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_slip_stage4_description
text.text: Clutch completely burned out. The vehicle is unable to move.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_synchronizer_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Worn synchronizers. Occasional grinding or difficulty when shifting gears.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_synchronizer_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Damaged synchronizers. Shifting gears is frequently difficult and may fail.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_synchronizer_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Broken synchronizer teeth. High chance of failed shifts or gear rejection under load.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_transmission_synchronizer_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Synchronizers completely failed. It is impossible to shift gears.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_powershift_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Low hydraulic pressure in Powershift. Slight delay and harshness when engaging gears.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_powershift_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Worn hydraulic pump seals. Noticeable lag and jolts during gear shifts.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_powershift_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Failing hydraulic pump. Severe delay and violent shocks when shifting.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_powershift_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Powershift hydraulic pump failed. Transmission is stuck in neutral.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_cvt_thermostat_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Thermostat is starting to stick. CVT may warm up slowly or run slightly hotter than normal under load.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_cvt_thermostat_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: The thermostat is partially stuck. The CVT temperature is unstable, leading to a risk of overheating during prolonged work.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_cvt_thermostat_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: The thermostat is mostly non-functional. The CVT is prone to severe overheating, which can cause internal damage.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_cvt_thermostat_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: The thermostat has failed completely, likely stuck in a closed position. Cooling is minimal, leading to rapid and dangerous overheating of the CVT.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_thermostat_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Engine thermostat is beginning to fail. The engine takes longer to reach optimal temperature or runs slightly hot.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_thermostat_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Thermostat response is poor. Engine temperature regulation is unstable, increasing wear.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_thermostat_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: The thermostat is stuck closed. The engine will constantly overheat under load.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_thermostat_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Complete thermostat failure. The engine coolant cannot circulate correctly, leading to imminent and severe overheating.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Minor internal pump leak. Hydraulic implements are slightly slower.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Worn pump seals. Noticeably slower hydraulic operations.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Damaged hydraulic pump. Implements are extremely slow and weak.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_hydraulic_pump_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Hydraulic pump failure. Hydraulic system is inoperable.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_electrical_system_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Worn insulation, occasional voltage drops. Minor electrical glitches can be observed.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_electrical_system_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Corroded contacts and unstable alternator output. Lights may fail, engine start is unreliable.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_electrical_system_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Risk of short circuits. Critical systems are unreliable and lights may fail completely.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_electrical_system_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Main wiring harness failed. The vehicle's electrical system is dead.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_carburetor_clogging_stage1_description
text.text: Slight carburetor contamination. Engine occasionally hesitates under heavy load.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_carburetor_clogging_stage2_description
text.text: Clogged jets. Engine frequently sputters and loses power, especially when throttle is applied quickly.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_carburetor_clogging_stage3_description
text.text: Severe carburetor blockage. Engine runs very rough, stalls frequently, and struggles to maintain power.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_carburetor_clogging_stage4_description
text.text: Fuel starvation due to a completely clogged carburetor. The engine will not run.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_yield_sensor_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Minor sensor contamination or calibration drift. The automatic threshing system is slightly less efficient, causing minimal crop loss.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_yield_sensor_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Inaccurate sensor readings are causing suboptimal adjustments to the threshing and separation systems. Yield loss is noticeable.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_yield_sensor_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Critical sensor malfunction. The control unit is receiving highly erroneous data, leading to significant losses as grain is incorrectly separated from chaff.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_yield_sensor_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Complete failure of the yield monitoring system. The combine is operating 'blind,' resulting in massive inefficiency and severe crop losses.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_material_flow_system_wear_stage1_description
text.text: Slight wear on internal augers and elevator chains. A small amount of crop is lost during internal transport.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_material_flow_system_wear_stage2_description
text.text: Worn auger flights and slipping conveyor belts are causing increased spillage inside the machine. You may hear occasional grinding noises.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_material_flow_system_wear_stage3_description
text.text: Damaged elevator paddles and augers are struggling to move the crop mass, leading to significant losses and a risk of a major clog.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_material_flow_system_wear_stage4_description
text.text: A major component in the material flow system has failed, causing a severe blockage. The engine is under extreme strain.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_unloading_auger_malfunction_stage1_description
text.text: Stretched drive belt. Occasional slipping results in a slight decrease in unloading speed.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_unloading_auger_malfunction_stage2_description
text.text: Worn drive belt and pulleys. Significant slipping under load noticeably reduces unloading speed.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_unloading_auger_malfunction_stage3_description
text.text: Damaged gearbox or heavily worn belt. The auger struggles to turn, operating at a very low speed.

text.name: ads_breakdowns_unloading_auger_malfunction_stage4_description
text.text: Drive belt snapped or gearbox seized. The unloading auger is completely jammed.

text.name: ads_cold_engine_message
text.text: Engine is cold! High revs cause wear!

text.name: ads_spec_next_planned_service_not_enouth_money_notification
text.text: Scheduled %s cancelled due to insufficient funds

text.name: ads_option_menu_inspection_visual_description
text.text: * Quick external check. Low cost and immediate result. Detects only serious faults (moderate severity+) and provides no data on the vehicle's technical state.

text.name: ads_option_menu_inspection_standard_description
text.text: * Routine diagnostic procedure. Identifies all active faults and generates a general report on the vehicle's condition.

text.name: ads_option_menu_inspection_complete_description
text.text: * Deep diagnostics. Guarantees detection of all faults and provides a comprehensive report with exact health percentages for all components.

text.name: ads_option_menu_maintenance_minimal_description
text.text: * Basic service. Significantly cheaper and faster, but does not fully restore the Service Level.

text.name: ads_option_menu_maintenance_standard_description
text.text: * Routine maintenance according to manufacturer specifications. Restores Service Level to normal.

text.name: ads_option_menu_maintenance_extended_description
text.text: * Comprehensive service. Takes longer and costs more, but boosts Service Level by an additional ~20%

text.name: ads_option_menu_repair_urgency_low_description
text.text: * Fill-in work when mechanics are free. Takes 50% longer, but offers a 10% discount on labor.

text.name: ads_option_menu_repair_urgency_medium_description
text.text: * Standard workshop schedule. Balanced labor cost and repair duration.

text.name: ads_option_menu_repair_urgency_high_description
text.text: * Emergency repair team. Reduces downtime by 50%, but increases labor cost by 10%.

text.name: ads_option_menu_overhaul_partial_description
text.text: * Restores Condition to normal level and takes less time and resources than a full overhaul.

text.name: ads_option_menu_overhaul_standard_description
text.text: * Comprehensive work on all major components. Restores Condition to good level.

text.name: ads_option_menu_overhaul_full_description
text.text: * Complete remanufacturing. High cost and duration, but restores Condition to excellent level.

text.name: ads_option_menu_part_used_description
text.text: * Salvaged parts. Very cheap, but extremely risky (~50% chance of defects)

text.name: ads_option_menu_part_aftermarket_description
text.text: * Budget aftermarket copies. Reduced cost, but carries a moderate risk of defects (33%).

text.name: ads_option_menu_part_oem_description
text.text: * Original Equipment Manufacturer parts. Standard reliability (10% defect risk) at full price.

text.name: ads_option_menu_part_premium_description
text.text: * Reinforced performance parts. Expensive, but strictly quality-controlled (0% defect risk).
